page.title: 17Industry.
page.content: n the Langer Road, Carr Road area of Felixstowe there is significant industrial development. The original premises of Sangamo Weston are the largest and most obvious. As the firm is concerned with making precision instruments, the building is without windows and instruments for monitoring weather conditions are visible on the roof. Further towards the dock, Sangamo have recently extended their premises in attractive, landscaped buildings. There are small, industrial units being developed near-by to encourage new business into the area, but only one unit is at present occupied by a glass-cutting company. On the other side of the road is a large new caravan site for holiday- makers. Each year sees more of this flat, open land being used.
